mapper.insert: insert into pay_refund (id, trade_no, refund_no, pay_type, refund_fee, refund_reason, refund_method, refund_status, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tradeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{refundNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{refundFee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{refundReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{refundMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{refundStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update pay_refund set trade_no = #{tradeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, refund_no = #{refundNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_type = #{payType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, refund_fee = #{refundFee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, refund_reason = #{refundReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, refund_method = #{refundMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, refund_status = #{refundStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, trade_no, refund_no, pay_type, refund_fee, refund_reason, refund_method, refund_status, create_time, update_time from pay_refund where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
